abstract: Iraqi forensic crews begin excavating 12 suspected mass graves that may contain bodies of 17,000 Shiite soldiers killed by Islamic State militants from former American base Camp Speicher.
lead_paragraph: Iraqi forensic teams began excavating 12 suspected mass grave sites that are thought to hold the bodies of as many as 1,700 soldiers killed in June by Islamic State militants.

headline.main: Iraq: Crews Start Burial Site Excavation
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iraq: Crews Start Burial Site Excavation

snippet: Iraqi forensic teams began excavating 12 suspected mass grave sites that are thought to hold the bodies of as many as 1,700 soldiers killed in June by Islamic State militants.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
